Sentencas: The concept of crystallographic index termed the effective index is suggested and applied to the design of ceria (CeO2)-based electrolytes to maximize oxide ionic conductivity.
Titulo: Oxide ionic conductivity and microstructures of Sm- or La-doped CeO2-based systems

Sentencas: The suggested index considers the fluorite structure, and combines the expected oxygen vacancy level with the ionic radius mismatch between host and dopant cations.
Titulo: Oxide ionic conductivity and microstructures of Sm- or La-doped CeO2-based systems

Sentencas: Using this approach, oxide ionic conductivity of Sm- or La-doped CeO2-based system has been optimized and tested under operating conditions of a solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Oxide ionic conductivity and microstructures of Sm- or La-doped CeO2-based systems

Sentencas: In the observation of microstructure in atomic scale, both Sm-doped CeO2 and La-doped CeO2 electrolytes had large micro-domains over 10 nm in the lattice.
Titulo: Oxide ionic conductivity and microstructures of Sm- or La-doped CeO2-based systems

Sentencas: On the other hand, Sm or La and alkaline earth co-doped CeO2-based electrolytes with high effective index had small micro-domains around 1-3 nm in the microstructure.
Titulo: Oxide ionic conductivity and microstructures of Sm- or La-doped CeO2-based systems

Sentencas: The large micro-domain would prevent oxide ion from passing through the lattice.
Titulo: Oxide ionic conductivity and microstructures of Sm- or La-doped CeO2-based systems

Sentencas: Therefore, it is concluded that the improvement of ionic conductivity is reflected in changes of microstructure in atomic scale.
Titulo: Oxide ionic conductivity and microstructures of Sm- or La-doped CeO2-based systems
